svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
May 6, 2023" date: "2023-05-06"
* Latest consensus layer devs call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Discussions on
CL max blobs per block and EL using SSZ or RLP to encode blob transactions
Latest consensus layer devs call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Discussions on CL max blobs per block and EL using SSZ or RLP to encode blob
* EIP4844: EIP4844 readiness checklist Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes
from Terence Blob transaction encoding options : EIP6493, EL specific SSZ or RLP based
* Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence
Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence
* Blob transaction encoding options : EIP6493, EL specific SSZ or RLP based
Blob transaction encoding options : EIP6493, EL specific SSZ or RLP based
* KZG ceremony has over 95,000 contributions , you can contribute with GitHub and/or
an account that has made 32 mainnet transactions, the lobby is regularly empty
KZG ceremony has over 95,000 contributions , you can contribute with GitHub and/or an
account that has made 32 mainnet transactions, the lobby is regularly empty
* Tim Beiko’s Core Devs update : summary of included & candidate EIPs for Dencun
Tim Beiko’s Core Devs update : summary of included & candidate EIPs for Dencun
* EF bug bounty program: execution layer & consensus layer disclosed vulnerabilities
EF bug bounty program: execution layer & consensus layer disclosed vulnerabilities
* Verkle implementers call notes : Beverly Hills testnet shuts down May 12
Verkle implementers call notes : Beverly Hills testnet shuts down May 12
* Proposal for warm/cold account balances , CALL with value has 6700 gas stipend
Proposal for warm/cold account balances , CALL with value has 6700 gas stipend
* Ben Edgington’s Upgrading Ethereum book Capella update
Ben Edgington’s Upgrading Ethereum book Capella update
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.8.0 : Obol distributed validator support and gossip
* Lodestar v1.8.0 : Obol distributed validator support and gossip queue enhancements
* Execution layer: Besu v23.4.0 : improvements to database performance, logging,
metrics, EVM performance and gas estimation; deprecates GoQuorum-compatible privacy
modes & IBFT1.0 Nethermind v1.18.0 : reduced memory usage, experimental reduced full
pruning time, improved sync time & block processing
* Besu v23.4.0 : improvements to database performance, logging, metrics, EVM
performance and gas estimation; deprecates GoQuorum-compatible privacy modes & IBFT1.0
Besu v23.4.0 : improvements to database performance, logging, metrics, EVM performance
and gas estimation; deprecates GoQuorum-compatible privacy modes & IBFT1.0
* Nethermind v1.18.0 : reduced memory usage, experimental reduced full pruning time,
Nethermind v1.18.0 : reduced memory usage, experimental reduced full pruning time,
* Aztec hybrid zkRollup roadmap : public & private state, not EVM compatible, UTXOs
represent data, contracts written in Noir, local testnet Q3, public testnet 2024
Aztec hybrid zkRollup roadmap : public & private state, not EVM compatible, UTXOs
* James Prestwich: shared sequencing for optimistic rollups
James Prestwich: shared sequencing for optimistic rollups
* EIPs: EIP6963 : Multi-injected provider interface (MIPI) EIP6968 : Contract secured
revenue on an EVM based L2 EIP6988 : Slashed validator cannot be elected as a block
* EIP6968 : Contract secured revenue on an EVM based L2
EIP6968 : Contract secured revenue on an EVM based L2
* EIP6988 : Slashed validator cannot be elected as a block proposer
EIP6988 : Slashed validator cannot be elected as a block proposer
* ERCs: ERC6956 : Asset-bound NFTs ERC6960 : Dual-layer token ERC6981 : Reserved
ownership accounts ERC6982 : Minimalistic efficient lockable tokens
* Foundry: Symbolic testing of Foundry projects using Halmos, hevm, KEVM &
EthBMC/Foundry Forge-exec : interact using languages such as JavaScript & Rust via
IPC, requires ffi Add Foundry to existing project without forge init Tip: use makeAddr
& makeAddrAndKey cheats to create accounts from a string
* Symbolic testing of Foundry projects using Halmos, hevm, KEVM & EthBMC/Foundry
Symbolic testing of Foundry projects using Halmos, hevm, KEVM & EthBMC/Foundry
* Forge-exec : interact using languages such as JavaScript & Rust via IPC, requires
Forge-exec : interact using languages such as JavaScript & Rust via IPC, requires ffi
* Add Foundry to existing project without forge init
Add Foundry to existing project without forge init
* Tip: use makeAddr & makeAddrAndKey cheats to create accounts from a string
Tip: use makeAddr & makeAddrAndKey cheats to create accounts from a string
* RareSkills Solidity tutorial for web2 devs, using Remix & Foundry
RareSkills Solidity tutorial for web2 devs, using Remix & Foundry
* Multi-contract reentrancy locks using a global contract with multiple lock levels,
Multi-contract reentrancy locks using a global contract with multiple lock levels,
* Secureum RACE #17: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #17: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
* Artemis : MEV bot framework in Rust, includes strategy for Seaport & Sudoswap NFT
Artemis : MEV bot framework in Rust, includes strategy for Seaport & Sudoswap NFT
* Guide to searching on Flashbots MEV-Share
Guide to searching on Flashbots MEV-Share
* DEI stablecoin on Arbitrum exploit , simple implementation error
DEI stablecoin on Arbitrum exploit , simple implementation error
* yAcademy: common DeFi forked protocol bugs
yAcademy: common DeFi forked protocol bugs
* Median gas returned to May 2022 level driven by meme coins
Median gas returned to May 2022 level driven by meme coins
* Stripe onramp via embeddable widget or no code link for ETH & USDC on mainnet, US
Stripe onramp via embeddable widget or no code link for ETH & USDC on mainnet, US only
* Sotheby’s Metaverse secondary NFT marketplace on mainnet, supports creator royalties
Sotheby’s Metaverse secondary NFT marketplace on mainnet, supports creator royalties
* Curve USD stablecoin deployed ; redeployed after missing fees & high gas usage
Curve USD stablecoin deployed ; redeployed after missing fees & high gas usage
* Dump Services : sell multiple tokens in a single transaction using CoW protocol
Dump Services : sell multiple tokens in a single transaction using CoW protocol
* Blend : Blur NFT perpetual lending with no oracles & no expiries, borrow or buy now
Blend : Blur NFT perpetual lending with no oracles & no expiries, borrow or buy now
* Umbra adds LUSD and RAI for stealth payments
Umbra adds LUSD and RAI for stealth payments
* Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
* Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
Snr React Native UI Dev at Status: All jobs
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
* Biden proposal for crypto mining tax equal to 30% of electricity costs
Biden proposal for crypto mining tax equal to 30% of electricity costs
* Coinbase International Exchange : perpetual futures exchange launched in Bermuda for
Coinbase International Exchange : perpetual futures exchange launched in Bermuda for
* AT&T email accounts hacked to steal users crypto
AT&T email accounts hacked to steal users crypto
* ZKML : convert TensorFlow Keras models into zk-compatible versions, proof of concept
ZKML : convert TensorFlow Keras models into zk-compatible versions, proof of concept
* Make sure to update to latest iOS and MacOS updates
Make sure to update to latest iOS and MacOS updates
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
* May 9 – Gitcoin Grants Beta Round ends (support Week in Eth News )
May 9 – Gitcoin Grants Beta Round ends (support Week in Eth News )
* May 11-14 – Pragma Lisbon & ETHGlobal Lisbon hackathon
May 11-14 – Pragma Lisbon & ETHGlobal Lisbon hackathon
* Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
